articles.title: Potentiating glymphatic drainage minimizes post-traumatic cerebral oedema - Nature.com
articles.description: Acute oedema after traumatic brain injury is accompanied by the suppression of glymphatic and lymphatic fluid flow due to excessive systemic release of noradrenaline.
